name: Orange Orchard
description:
Welcome to Orange Orchard!

In this two-player card game, you will compete against another farmer to grow the most oranges in town! Boost your orange production and sabotage your enemy to claim victory!

Play the game here or download the pcio file and import it yourself at playingcards.io! To import files into playingcards.io, please see this guide.

Happy farming!
